title: New Mode - CTF plz
body: Let's see a Capture the flag mode, something a little different to offset the boredom.

replies.body:
Yeah, i'll just pick Hecarim or Rammus and win the game
Or Ryze, Why not Kayle Zilean ult together with Hecarim? Its kinda dumb people will just have to pick fast champion to win the game.
